page.title: 08THE COUNTRY DANCE FESTIVAL
page.content: The country dance festival is held at {Wells}on the{third Saturday of June but this year it was held on June 22nd. As it was raining very heavily when we got there the festival was cancelled. If it hadn't been, we would have met at{St. Cuthbert's Church}and at 2 o'clock would have left the church yard to march up{Wells}High Street to the{Cathedral Green.}The police would have to stop the traffic. There are usually about 15 dances altogether with some sword dances. We wear costumes which were new this year. They were green socks, cream trousers which came down to the knees for the boys, cream coloured shirts, green velvet waistcoats, a belt and black daps.
